LanguageData.PsionicAscension.label: Psionic Ascendency
LanguageData.PsionicAscension.description: A set of permanent changes bestowed upon a person by a unique and intense exposure to the psychic field. Known as Psionic Ascension, these mental and physical preternatural gifts come in varying levels, with each concurrent one making the person increasingly powerful.\n\nPsionic Ascension is poorly documented within the Ordo Historia. They believe it is caused by Crystalloid Archotech, but its exact changes and limits are unknown. Former Collective Crystalloids are either unaware of its existance or believe it to be a manifestation of the Ekrian's divinity.

LanguageData.CrystalloidIchorLoss.label: ichor loss
LanguageData.CrystalloidIchorLoss.description: A reduction in the normal ichor volume. Minor ichor loss has relatively mild effects, but when ichor loss becomes severe, oxygen transport becomes badly impaired and the victim loses the ability to move. Extreme ichor loss leads to death. \nIchor loss naturally recovers over time as the body slowly regenerates its ichor supply.
